name: ng-pell
description: An angular wrapper for the pell library

scripts.prepublish: npm run update-contrib && npm run update-coc && ./node_modules/.bin/ngc -p ./tsconfig.json
scripts.postpublish: git add ./dist && git commit -m 'version(BUMP): upgraded version' && git tag `npm view ng-pell version` && git push && git push --tags
scripts.update-contrib: weallcontribute -o . && git add CONTRIBUTING.md && git commit -m 'docs(contributing): updated CONTRIBUTING.md'
scripts.update-coc: weallbehave -o . && git add CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md && git commit -m 'docs(coc): updated CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md'
